## R Markdown


```{r }
read all 8 tables

genelists_directory <- "~/Google\ Drive/rnaseq/gene_ontology/input/DESeq"
de_worker_clo <- read.table(file = file.path(genelists_directory, "worker/wald_clo/de_genes_for_topGO.txt"), head=TRUE)
de_queen_clo  <- read.table(file = file.path(genelists_directory, "queen/de_genes_for_topGO.txt"), head=TRUE)
de_worker_imi <- read.table(file = file.path(genelists_directory, "worker/wald_imi/de_genes_for_topGO.txt"), head=TRUE)

significant_worker_clo <- subset(de_worker_clo, adjusted_pvalue <= 0.05)$locus
significant_queen_clo  <- subset(de_queen_clo,  adjusted_pvalue <= 0.05)$locus
significant_worker_imi <- subset(de_worker_imi, adjusted_pvalue <= 0.05)$locus
  

venneu <- euler(combinations = list("Worker clothianidin" = significant_worker_clo, 
                                    "Queen clothianidin" = significant_queen_clo, 
                                    "Worker\nimidacloprid" = significant_worker_imi ))

plot(venneu,
  quantities = TRUE,
  labels = list(font = 18))
  
plot(venneu)
```
